encyclopedia.content: thermos n. 热水瓶，保温瓶的商标 Thermos是以生产真空保温瓶的德国厂的注册商标，由Thermos G.M.B.H公司于1904年在德国创立，至今100多年历史，其创意来源于希腊文"THERME"，意指“热”，后经创意演变成臆造词'THERMOS"。现为台、日合资企业。

entry.def: A Thermos ,Thermos flask, or in American English Thermos bottle, is a container which is used to keep hot drinks hot or cold drinks cold. It has two thin shiny glass walls with no air between them.

means.word_mean: 1. vacuum flask that preserves temperature of hot or cold drinks
